text: Emlichheim (Low German: Emmelkamp) is a municipality in the County of Bentheim in Lower Saxony, Germany, about 20 km south of Emmen, and 25 km northwest of Nordhorn. == Geography == Emlichheim is right on the German-Dutch border. The community is bordered on the south by the river Vechte and on the north by the Coevorden-Picardy Canal. It is the administrative seat of the Samtgemeinde Emlichheim, whose members also include Hoogstede, Laar and Ringe. == Partner communities == * Genemuiden, Netherlands since about 1975 * Grabów nad Prosną, Poland since 2006 == References == Category:County of Bentheim (district)
title: Emlichheim
